mFudgeFactor.description: Multiplier for velocity change with all impacts.

mAddedZVelocityFactor.description: Added Z Velocity multiplier. DOES NOT specify how much velocity. This number should be small 0.0-1.0 range

mMaxAddedZVelocity.description: The maximum Z velocity that can be added on a collision.

mMaxCollisionVelocity.description: The maximum velocity that can be added on a collision.

mMinVelocityForAddedZ.description: The minimum velocity required for any fudged Z values to take effect. This helps when player just runs against the vehicle.
